name: OverAPI Print Friendly
description:
Make OverAPI cheatsheet print friendly.
All text black, remove unnecessary blocks.
Use the print dialog to see the difference.
(This stylesheet is applied for printing only)


tip: If the last column is cutoff in print preview, change the 'zoom' level of the page to make the columns readjust. 'Zoom' can be changed by Ctrl+'+' or Ctrl+'-' , Ctrl + scroll wheel or from the browser menu.
